title: What are different types of essays and how to write them differently? - Quora

response.answer_text: Types of an Essay: Before writing an essay make sure what type of essay you want to write. Basically, There are four types of Essay. Narrative Essays: showing a story In a narrative essay, the writer tells a story about a real-life experience to the readers. Descriptive Essays: Designing an Image A descriptive essay is a short paper that is all regarding describing or summarizing a subject. Its’ is the educational school assignment essay. in general, students ought to illustrate a descriptive essay with words rather than exploitation footage. Describe no matter you see, feel, touch taste, or hear regarding the target topic. Expository Essays: just the Facts Expository writing differs from other forms of writing. An expository essay is a method of writing which serves to explain, clarify, something in a way that it becomes clear for readers. Persuasive Essays: Convince me Persuasive essay or Argument essay is writing peace in which the author tries to convince readers to a particular stance or point of view. It can be written about a subject. A persuasive essay is one of the best ways to understand other your point of view.
